MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:56pm. We are aware of the previous power cut affecting the area. Our next available engineer will attend site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:26pm on the 24th November 2020.
